divs: Sighting DetailsI went to my back yard to let my dog out. I looked up towards the north-eastern sky and something that was silver that caught my eye. I thought this might've been a jet airliner and looked away. My dog was barking at the same object so I looked again and realized that is a sphere and not a commercial jet aircraft. After seeing this again, I realized that there two more spheres , also in a silver color, which seemed to have orbited around the first sphere I saw. After witnessing this for a few minutes, the objects went up into the sky where I lost sight of them.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Lehigh Acres
There were no other sightings in Lehigh Acres on or around August 13th 2008
